mapper.insert: insert into tbl_stock(sno, sname, stock_qty, shelf_life, isburger) values (seq_stock_sno.nextval, #{sname}, #{stock_qty}, #{shelf_life}, #{isburger})
mapper.select: select sname, sum(stock_qty) AS stock_qty from tbl_stock group by sname
select sno, sname, stock_qty, TO_CHAR(shelf_life, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as shelf_life, TO_CHAR(STOCK_REGDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as stock_regdate from tbl_stock where sname=#{sname} order by shelf_life
mapper.update: update tbl_stock set stock_qty=#{stock_qty} where sno=#{sno}
update tbl_stock set stock_qty = stock_qty + #{qty} where sno=#{sno}
